Description: Monsoon rains led to flooding in several parts of Jaipur.
Intense rainfall resulted in waterlogging and transportation disruptions.
Protests and strikes disrupted normal life and transportation in the city.
Jaipur faced a major locust invasion
A major fire broke out in a commercial complex
An extreme heatwave with temperatures exceeding 46Â°C affected the city.
Heavy monsoon rains caused significant flooding in parts of Jaipur.
A severe dust storm and thunderstorm caused damage to property and power outages.

Unseasonal heavy rains led to widespread flooding and evacuations.
